main._comment_preventDestructionByPiston: // Prevents headless pistons from destroying blocks that are not piston extensions.
main._comment_allowedDestructibleByPiston_1: // Allows headless pistons to destroy certain blocks when preventing destruction is enabled.
main._comment_allowedDestructibleByPiston_2: // Useful to allow only breaking of bedrock but denying destruction of barriers.

survival._comment_legaliseWholeInventory: // Whether to check whole inventory when connecting / changing dimensions, etc.
survival._comment_bannedSurvivalItems: // Which items should be cleared when clicked in survival inventory

creative._comment_legaliseWholeInventory: // Whether to check whole inventory when connecting / changing dimensions, etc.
creative._comment_removeCreativeNBTTags: // Disallow all NBT tags in creative which aren't in whitelist section.

packet._comment_allowedHealthTags_1: // Allows health tags for certain entities.
packet._comment_allowedHealthTags_2: // This maps entity ID to percentage as decimal.

duplication._comment_patchSaveLimit1: // Whether to prevent throwing an error when saving large string data.
duplication._comment_patchSaveLimit2: // This is done by ignoring data after DataOutputStream limit.
duplication._comment_patchSaveLimit3: // Written books can reach that point with hacked clients.
duplication._comment_patchGravityBlock: // Whether to disable gravity block duping.
duplication._comment_patchDeathDuplication1: // Checks if player is connected before applying damage.
duplication._comment_patchDeathDuplication2: // Prevents duplicating inventory if player dies after disconnect.
